metadata.title: CVE-2018-0497 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
ARM mbed TLS before 2.12.0, before 2.7.5, and before 2.1.14 allows remoteattackers to achieve partial plaintext recovery (for a CBC basedciphersuite) via a timing-based side-channel attack. This vulnerabilityexists because of an incorrect fix (with a wrong SHA-384 calculation) forCVE-2013-0169.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0497` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmbedcrypto3 - 2.12.0-1
libmbedtls12 - 2.12.0-1
libmbedx509-0 - 2.12.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.12.0-1').
